about.intro-content: Ecency on kaunis ja k√§tev√§ Hive-lohkoketjun k√§ytt√∂liittym√§k√§√§re, jonka avulla voit luoda omia julkaisuja, seurata sy√∂ttett√§si, √§√§nest√§√§ mit√§ haluat, kirjoittaa kommentteja, lukea vastauksia, tehd√§ kaikki t√§rkeimm√§t Hiven toiminnot p√§ivitt√§isess√§ sosiaalisessa selaislussa, sis√§lt√§en lompakon toiminnot ja muita lis√§osia, mukaanlukien haut, l√∂yt√§√§ erilaisia tunnisteita jne.

faq.what-is-ecency-body:
Ecency on lohkoketju -pohjainen sosiaalinen verkosto, jonka on luonut Hive.

Ecency tarjoaa sensuroimattoman, vapaan, rajattoman ja palkitsevan alustan sis√§ll√∂n luojille.

Hankkeen k√§ynnisti ja perusti Elokuussa 2016 @good-karma vaihtoehtoiseksi sosiaaliseksi verkostoksi. Siit√§ l√§htien hanke on kasvanut paljon suuremmaksi joukoksi osallistujia (k√§√§nt√§j√§t, testaajat, kehitt√§j√§t, vaikuttajat, sis√§ll√∂ntuottajat ja kuluttajat), jotka mahdollistivat Ecencyn.

Ecency auttaa perehdytt√§m√§√§n ihmisi√§ lohkoketjuteknologiaan, jossa k√§ytt√§jille maksetaan ajasta sek√§ resursseista ja voimme oppia samalla nauttia lohkoketjun sosiaalisista n√§k√∂kohdista. Helppok√§ytt√∂isyyden ansiosta k√§ytt√§j√§t oppivat ja my√∂s siirtyv√§t sijoittajiksi, teknologian ja yhteis√∂n uudistajiksi.
faq.what-is-hive-body: Hive on lohkoketju, joka oli suunniteltu olemaan nopea, ilmainen, hajautettu sek√§ sensuroimaton alusta Web3- sovelluksineen, joissa on sis√§√§nrakennettuja ominaisuuksia, joissa omistajat voivat ansaita palkintoja. Hive-lohkoketjun yleisimm√§t merkit ovat HIVE, HIVE DOLLARS, HIVE POWER.
faq.what-is-difference-header: Mik√§ ero on Ecencyll√§ ja muilla Hive-k√§ytt√∂liittymill√§?
faq.what-is-difference-body: Kaikkien liit√§nt√∂jen tai sovellusten ensisijaiset erot ovat ominaisuuksissa ja k√§ytt√∂tapauksissa. Ecency tarjoaa verkkosivun sek√§ mobiili- ja ty√∂p√∂yt√§sovelluksen helppok√§ytt√∂isyyden ja parhaan tietoturvan pohjalta.
faq.why-choose-ecency-body: You will always stay in touch with Ecency mobile application while not missing any notification and use on go. With desktop app, you are always sure to get uncensored content right from blockchain, while websites prone to follow laws and jurisdiction they reside to abide DMCA and other government laws, there is always chance some posts might not be accessible. State of art security measures so your keys will always stay encrypted and out of reach for ill-intentioned individuals. Fast and beautiful website, helps you to get discovered online and gain exposure for your content and gain loyal followers and readers. Build your community with Ecency today and take advantages of emerging blockchain technology and uncensored content!
faq.how-ecency-works-body: Ecency stores and reads data from the blockchain, and thus data is accessible and uncensored. Ecency rewards content creators with built-in incentive mechanism of blockchain, with tokens (HIVE, HIVE DOLLARS, HIVE POWER) as well as Points. Tokens can be purchased and sold in major cryptocurrency exchanges (e.g. Binance, Bittrex).
faq.how-to-join-body: Go to https://ecency.com/?referral=ecency to create an account. Your password is your master key to your account. Please store it safely, if you loose your password, you ultimately loose access to your account and your funds. Accounts can not be deactivated or deleted, account names can not be changed as well. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the blockchain. Without password, accounts cannot be restored as well, store your keys safely.
faq.how-to-signin-header: How to sign in to Ecency?
faq.how-to-signin-body: You can sign-in to Ecency by using your Username and Master password or by using Active Private Keys. We take security very seriously, that's why we never store your private keys, on mobile app they are encrypted with extra PIN code of your choice, on website they are never stored. You can also use Hivesigner OAuth2 authentication service to easily login, manage and perform actions.
faq.how-referrals-work-header: How referral system work on Ecency?
faq.how-referrals-work-body: Referral system is simple, you can invite your friends by adding your username in this link https://ecency.com/?referral=username and share it with your friends. Once your friends join Ecency and earn their first 250 Points, you will earn 100 Points.
faq.what-is-points-header: What are Ecency Points and how to use them?
faq.what-is-points-body: Ecency Points are continually created and rewarded for all users for various social activities they perform on website, mobile or desktop app. Points can be used for promoting, boosting your content, can even be transferred or gifted to another user. You can also purchase Points with our mobile apps.
faq.where-tokens-come-header: Where do the tokens come from?
faq.where-tokens-come-body: The Hive network continually creates new digital tokens to reward content creators and curators. Some of the newly-created tokens are transferred to users who add value to platform by posting, commenting, and voting on other people's posts. The remainder is distributed to holders of HIVE POWER and the witnesses that power the blockchain.
faq.how-promotion-work-body: Promoting content with Points is easiest way to get more exposure. Promotions have certain time period and shuffled across feeds. Any post, can be promoted to get more exposure and engagement.
faq.how-boosting-work-body:
Points can be used for boosting content (post and comments). Boosting requests are manually reviewed by our moderators and curators which might take upto 24 hours.

As part of the qualities check, we may consider: a) was content posted from Ecency, b) not detected by cheetah, mackbot, hivewatchers, or any other blacklists etc. c) not voted by Ecency team in last couple hours d) user is not in Ecency blacklist due to abusive behavior.

Boosting does not guarantee curation, if content is not curated within 24 hours Points will be refunded.
faq.how-to-transfer-body: After login, you will find Wallet page (in top header on website and desktop app, bottom navigation bar on mobile app). In wallet page you can initiate transfer of any token you hold to another user or exchange accounts, click on arrow next to your balance and find transfer operations. Transfers are irreversible because they are registered on blockchain, use with caution.
faq.how-see-rewards-header: How do I see my post rewards?
faq.how-see-rewards-body:
In Wallet page (in top header on website and desktop app, bottom navigation bar on mobile app), you can see Curation rewards (the rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments) and Author rewards (the rewards earned by your own posts and comments)

You can also view the same information for other users by visiting their wallet profile.
faq.when-claim-rewards-header: When can I claim my rewards?
faq.when-claim-rewards-body: Posts and comments remain active for 7 days and rewards are fluctuates depending on votes and market price of token, that is why rewards are approximated as pending reward. When the period is over, pending reward changes to actual reward and you are able to claim earned rewards. In your Wallet, click the Claim Rewards button to add the tokens to your account.
faq.what-are-rc-body:
Transacting on the Hive blockchain has zero fees, transaction rate-limiting is employed to safeguard the blockchain from spam attacks. Every action that you take on the blockchain will consume a small amount of Resource Credits. This includes posting, commenting, voting, transferring tokens, etc. Viewing content does not consume Resource Credits.

Every user has a limited amount of Resource Credits to use each week. The more transactions a user does, the less Resource Credits they will have left (until they recharge). Users with more HIVE POWER will have more Resource Credits.

If you run out of Resource Credits, you will be unable to transact with the blockchain until your Resource Credits recharge (happens automatically) or you acquire additional HIVE POWER to increase your Resource Credit balance or you can request Boosting account from Ecency to receive temporary delegation.
faq.how-boost-account-body: If your account is low on Resource Credits, you can request account boosting from Ecency. You will receive temporary delegation which should boost your account to perform more activities on blockchain.
faq.what-spam-abuse-header: What is considered spam or abuse?
faq.what-spam-abuse-body:
• Plagiarized posts or copied content.
  • Leaving nearly identical or materially similar comments on multiple posts.
  • Using tags that are unrelated to the post.
  • Threatening users with any type of physical violence.
  • Not citing sources when using someone else‚Äôs material.
  • Posting ‚Äònot safe for work‚Äô content without using the ‚Äúnsfw‚Äù tag.
  • Scams or Fraudulent offers.
faq.can-link-post-header: Can I request adding backlink to my website?
faq.can-link-post-body: All the content on our site is created by users and we don't modify or able to add backlinks. You are free to contact author of the post or Signup to open your own blog and community.
faq.can-guest-post-header: Is it possible to guest post on your website?
faq.can-guest-post-body: Posting on Ecency is simple and easy, Signup to open your own blog and community, start posting your content.
